title: Tricolor’s Founder Declines Over 100 Times to Discuss Its Demise
description: For five hours, lawyers for creditors pressed Daniel Chu again and again on Tuesday for details on the collapse of his subprime auto-loan business Tricolor Holdings.
content: For five hours, lawyers for creditors pressed Daniel Chu again and again on Tuesday for details on the collapse of his subprime auto-loan business Tricolor Holdings.
